price: Izuzetak su oni koji se pokaju poslije toga i poprave, a Allah je, doista, Onaj Koji oprašta grijehe i milostiv je.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
